Title: Caleb
Writer: Carlton Cuse (developer), Kerry Ehrin (developer), Anthony Cipriano (developer), Alexandra Cunningham, Robert Bloch (based on characters from the novel 'Psycho' by), Anthony Cipriano (creator)
Actors: Vera Farmiga, Freddie Highmore, Max Thieriot, Olivia Cooke
Plot: Norma is disappointed to learn that she didn't get a part in the community play. She makes a new friend however in Christine Heldens who was supposed to direct the play but quit when Norma ...
